text: Christian Koffi (born 21 December 1990) is an Ivorian footballer who currently plays as a midfielder for TP Mazembe of the Democratic Republic of the Congo. He has appeared in three matches for his national team, but has yet to register a goal.Soccerway Profile ==References== ==External links== * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Ivorian footballers Category:TP Mazembe players Category:Séwé Sport de San-Pédro players Category:People from Dabou Category:Ivorian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Ivorian expatriate sportspeople in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ivory Coast international footballers
title: Christian Koffi
